name.ja: ハイブリッドライブ・バックフュージョン

requirement.en: Shuffle 4 Dragon Type and/or Machine Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Your opponent Special Summons 1 monster from their Graveyard to their field in face-down Defense Position. Then, you can Fusion Summon by shuffling 1 Dragon Type monster and 1 Machine Type monster from your Graveyard into the Deck as material. You can only attack with Fusion Monsters until the end of this turn.
